title: Tokenomics
text: Decision is made together by DAO

section.title: NFT distribution
section.content: ArkenDoge is limited to a total of 10,000 NFT. 9250 will be freely available to public to mint, while 750 will be give to people who helps ArkenDoge DAO

section.title: Isn't this just a normal NFT? What's so special about it?
section.content: ArkenDoge NFT represents a membership card which can be used to enjoy priviledge in the real world! Moreover, we have a secret plan for you in crypto world!
